details.description: A 15-minute animation movie depicting the mythology and history of the Sun Temple of Konark in a specially designed, air-conditioned auditorium.
gallery_descriptions: Medieval engineering concepts of the Sun Temple of Konark and various other Sun temples of Odisha and India, with historical interpretation and archive literature
Scale models of the original Sun Temple of Konark and its current state
Various sculpture models inspired by the wealth of architectural specimens in the Sun Temple complex
available_services: Parking facilities for cars (¥ 20/- for 2 hours) and two and three-wheeler (% 10/-for 2 hours)
Parking facilities for tourist buses (¥ 50/- for 2 hours)
Cafeteria (operated by Kamat Group of Hotels)
facilities: Wheelchair facility (free-of-cost for visitors to the Interpretation Centre)

name: Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. Holiday Listing
